data.title: Tag Archive for "Gabe Simon"
data.text:
Gabe Simon, an incredibly talented writer, producer and artist has joined the Foundations family. The entire team is excited to welcome Gabe, who will be managed by Drew Simmons out of the Nashville office.

Gabe Simon began his career while in college, writing for and fronting the indie-rock band Kopecky (fka Kopecky Family Band). The band racked up critical acclaim as well as AAA and Alternative Radio success for the 2012 release of “Kids Raising Kids” via ATO Records and the 2015 sophomore release of “Drug For The Modern Age”. Since then, Gabe has produced and written songs for numerous projects including Dua Lipa, American Authors, Jai Wolf, Cherub, Vinyl Theatre and MAX to name a few. Gabe also has a project called Mr. Gabriel (with Mark Pontius from Foster The People) and is featured as well as wrote and performed on the Jai Wolf singles “Starlight” and “Lose My Mind.”
